name: Covert Psychological Warfare
description: Using deception, misinformation, and psychological triggers to disrupt enemy forces.

cards.title: Planting False Information
cards.description: Techniques for spreading misinformation to destabilize adversaries.
cards.bulletpoints: Seeding fake reports, controlled opposition, deepfake tactics
cards.summaryText: Design misinformation drops, controlled opposition narratives, and deepfake releases that fracture enemy trust networks without exposing the source.

cards.title: Psychological Shock and Awe
cards.description: Utilizing fear, confusion, and unpredictability to break enemy morale.
cards.bulletpoints: Sensory overload, fear-based narratives, symbolic warfare
cards.summaryText: Stage shock campaigns combining sensory overload, fear messaging, and symbolic strikes to paralyze decision makers and erode morale.
